physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Tenderness to palpation over lower thoracic and lumbar spine, and lumbar paraspinal muscles; other findings normal.
Discomfort in the right lower quadrant without rebound tenderness; tenderness in the lower paraspinal muscles on the right side; tenderness at the costovertebral angle bilaterally.
Tenderness over lower right paraspinal muscles with palpation, costovertebral angle tenderness bilaterally; normal deep-tendon reflexes.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Chest radiographs showed new elevation of the right hemidiaphragm compared to 6 days earlier.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Grade 2/6 systolic murmur at the right upper sternal border; otherwise unchanged.
Induration at the site of a tuberculin skin test measured 10 mm in diameter.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: CT of the chest revealed new features consistent with previous granulomatous infection.
